author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a new testing code to check V14 geometry of HGCal. Also add cfg's to work for multiple test codes

#### PR validation:

Tested using the cfg files in Validation/HGCalValidation/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run4-hgx260 Add a new testing code to check V14 geometry of HGCal
